name: SCUBA (ZerstorenHV)
description:
SCUBA is a game about the trials and tribulations of surviving underwater in the least aerodynamic vehicle possible.

Brave the depths of an aquatic wonderland, with all the bright colors and flashy lights you can shake a stick at! But beware... just like the amusement park industry abuses its workers, you'll have to take advantage of the sea's denizens in order to get to the bottom of this mysterious puddle.

Made for the Chillennium Game Jam 2018 by Team THEM.
